A.1 INVITATION EMAIL AND SURVEY FLOW In this Appendix, we present screenshots of one complete survey flow. In this iteration of the flow, questions about expected stock returns were asked ahead of questions about expected GDP growth; the survey implementation randomizes across these two blocks of questions. We begin by reviewing the invitation email sent to individuals from Vanguard.
